https://tmrev.io/movie/582377-Bori 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6fCdVepSzkVgCkfIeCdyVnF4nhu.jpg Bori, an 11-year-old girl who lives in a sea village, is the only family member who can hear. Being an elementary school student, Bori gradually becomes more familiar with communicating with her friends at school by speaking and has a difficult time joining a sign language conversation at home. Why was I the only person born different from my family? The more she thinks about it, the more she feels alienated. Bori
